description: I never make gravy Some people find that perplexing, but I don’t like it — there’s just too much fat involved Instead, I make this mushroom ragout and spoon it over the turkey and on the side.
title: Mushroom Ragout ‘Gravy’
text:
I never make gravy. Some people find that perplexing, but I don’t like it — there’s just too much fat involved. Instead, I make this mushroom ragout and spoon it over the turkey and on the side.
Featured in: Mushroom Ragout ‘Gravy’.
